statements: SELECT * FROM biometric_geolocation_data ORDER BY transaction_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, biometric_identifier FROM biometric_geolocation_data WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT transaction_id, geolocation_data FROM biometric_geolocation_data ORDER BY transaction_id ASC
SELECT * FROM biometric_geolocation_data WHERE biometric_identifier LIKE 'fingerprint%'
SELECT user_id, geolocation_data FROM biometric_geolocation_data
SELECT user_id, biometric_identifier, geolocation_data FROM biometric_geolocation_data WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT transaction_id, biometric_identifier, geolocation_data FROM biometric_geolocation_data ORDER BY transaction_id DESC
SELECT user_id, biometric_identifier FROM biometric_geolocation_data WHERE biometric_identifier LIKE '%finger%'
SELECT user_id, MAX(transaction_id) AS max_transaction_id FROM biometric_geolocation_data GROUP BY user_id
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS user_count, MAX(transaction_id) AS max_transaction_id FROM biometric_geolocation_data
SELECT * FROM geolocation_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT geolocation_id, latitude, longitude FROM geolocation_data WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -80
SELECT * FROM biometric_identifiers WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012'
SELECT biometric_id, user_id FROM biometric_identifiers ORDER BY biometric_id LIMIT 5
SELECT biometric_id, biometric_data FROM biometric_identifiers
SELECT * FROM geolocation_data WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -70;
SELECT geolocation_id, latitude, timestamp FROM geolocation_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT biometric_id, user_id, biometric_data FROM biometric_identifiers WHERE user_id = 'a1b2c3' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM geolocation_data WHERE longitude BETWEEN -80 AND -70 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT geolocation_id, latitude, longitude FROM geolocation_data WHERE latitude < 35 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, latitude, longitude FROM geolocation_data WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT fingerprint, face_scan FROM biometric_identifiers WHERE user_id = 3
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100
SELECT latitude, longitude, user_id FROM geolocation_data WHERE user_id = 2
SELECT user_id, face_scan, fingerprint FROM biometric_identifiers WHERE user_id = 4
SELECT * FROM geolocation_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, latitude, longitude FROM geolocation_data WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, fingerprint FROM biometric_identifiers WHERE user_id = 456;
SELECT user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, face_scan FROM biometric_identifiers WHERE user_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM geolocation_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, latitude, longitude FROM geolocation_data WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM geolocation_data WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -75;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, status FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount >= 100 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT biometric_identifiers.user_id, biometric_identifiers.fingerprint, transaction_verification.verification_result FROM biometric_identifiers INNER JOIN transaction_verification ON biometric_identifiers.user_id = transaction_verification.user_id WHERE verification_result = TRUE ORDER BY biometric_identifiers.user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM geolocation_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM geolocation_data WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, fingerprint FROM biometric_identifiers WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, status FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, verification_result FROM transaction_verification WHERE verification_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM geolocation_data ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id,latitude,longitude FROM geolocation_data WHERE latitude < 40.0 AND longitude > -75.0
SELECT user_id,date,amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000.00 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT user_id,full_name,date_of_birth FROM user_profiles WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01'
SELECT * FROM user_verifications WHERE verified = 1
SELECT * FROM geolocation_data ORDER BY latitude DESC, longitude ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING average_amount > 1000
SELECT u.full_name, p.date_of_birth, v.verified FROM user_profiles AS u LEFT JOIN user_verifications AS v ON u.user_id = v.user_id
SELECT id, fingerprint_hash, LENGTH(facial_template) AS template_length FROM biometric_identifiers WHERE template_length > 100
SELECT u.full_name, g.latitude, g.longitude FROM user_profiles AS u JOIN geolocation_data AS g ON u.user_id = g.user_id WHERE g.latitude < 0
